description: Numbers n such that 20*R_n + 9 is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that (2*10^(n+1)+61)/9 is prime.a(14) > 10^5. - _Robert Price_, Nov 01 2014
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 22...229.
